trans-unit.source: Customer Card
trans-unit.target: Customer Card
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: New,Process,Report,New Document,Approve,Request Approval,Prices and Discounts,Navigate,Customer
trans-unit.target: New,Process,Report,New Document,Approve,Request Approval,Prices and Discounts,Navigate,Customer
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Property PromotedActionCategories

trans-unit.source: General
trans-unit.target: General
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Control General - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of the customer. The field is either filled automatically from a defined number series, or you enter the number manually because you have enabled manual number entry in the number-series setup.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the number of the customer. The field is either filled automatically from a defined number series, or you enter the number manually because you have enabled manual number entry in the number-series setup.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Control No. - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the customer's name. This name will appear on all sales documents for the customer. You can enter a maximum of 50 characters, both numbers and letters.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the customer's name. This name will appear on all sales documents for the customer. You can enter a maximum of 50 characters, both numbers and letters.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Control Name - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies an alternate name that you can use to search for a customer.
trans-unit.target: Specifies an alternate name that you can use to search for a customer.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Control Search Name - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the customer's intercompany partner code.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the customer's intercompany partner code.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Control IC Partner Code - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the payment amount that the customer owes for completed sales. This value is also known as the customer's balance.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the payment amount that the customer owes for completed sales. This value is also known as the customer's balance.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Control Balance (LCY) - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies payments from the customer that are overdue per today's date.
trans-unit.target: Specifies payments from the customer that are overdue per today's date.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Control Balance Due (LCY) - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum amount you allow the customer to exceed the payment balance before warnings are issued.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the maximum amount you allow the customer to exceed the payment balance before warnings are issued.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Control Credit Limit (LCY) - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies which transactions with the customer that cannot be blocked, for example, because the customer is insolvent.
trans-unit.target: Specifies which transactions with the customer that cannot be blocked, for example, because the customer is insolvent.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Control Blocked - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to limit access to data for the data subject during daily operations. This is useful, for example, when protecting data from changes while it is under privacy review.
trans-unit.target: Specifies whether to limit access to data for the data subject during daily operations. This is useful, for example, when protecting data from changes while it is under privacy review.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Control Privacy Blocked - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies a code for the salesperson who normally handles this customer's account.
trans-unit.target: Specifies a code for the salesperson who normally handles this customer's account.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Control Salesperson Code - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the code for the responsibility center that will administer this customer by default.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the code for the responsibility center that will administer this customer by default.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Control Responsibility Center - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the code for the service zone that is assigned to the customer.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the code for the service zone that is assigned to the customer.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Control Service Zone Code - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the preferred method of sending documents to this customer, so that you do not have to select a sending option every time that you post and send a document to the customer. Sales documents to this customer will be sent using the specified sending profile and will override the default document sending profile.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the preferred method of sending documents to this customer, so that you do not have to select a sending option every time that you post and send a document to the customer. Sales documents to this customer will be sent using the specified sending profile and will override the default document sending profile.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Control Document Sending Profile - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Total Sales
trans-unit.target: Total Sales
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Control TotalSales2 - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies your total sales turnover with the customer in the current fiscal year. It is calculated from amounts excluding VAT on all completed and open invoices and credit memos.
trans-unit.target: Specifies your total sales turnover with the customer in the current fiscal year. It is calculated from amounts excluding VAT on all completed and open invoices and credit memos.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Control TotalSales2 - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Costs (LCY)
trans-unit.target: Costs (LCY)
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Control CustSalesLCY - CustProfit - AdjmtCostLCY - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies how much cost you have incurred from the customer in the current fiscal year.
trans-unit.target: Specifies how much cost you have incurred from the customer in the current fiscal year.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Control CustSalesLCY - CustProfit - AdjmtCostLCY - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Profit (LCY)
trans-unit.target: Profit (LCY)
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Control AdjCustProfit - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies how much profit you have made from the customer in the current fiscal year.
trans-unit.target: Specifies how much profit you have made from the customer in the current fiscal year.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Control AdjCustProfit - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Profit %
trans-unit.target: Profit %
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Control AdjProfitPct - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies how much profit you have made from the customer in the current fiscal year, expressed as a percentage of the customer's total sales.
trans-unit.target: Specifies how much profit you have made from the customer in the current fiscal year, expressed as a percentage of the customer's total sales.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Control AdjProfitPct - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies when the customer card was last modified.
trans-unit.target: Specifies when the customer card was last modified.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Control Last Date Modified - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies that you can change customer name in the document, because the name is not used in search.
trans-unit.target: Specifies that you can change customer name in the document, because the name is not used in search.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Control Disable Search by Name - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Control Bill-to Customer No. - Property Caption

trans-unit.target: Specifies a different customer who will be invoiced for products that you sell to the customer in the Name field on the customer card.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Control Bill-to Customer No. - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the customer's VAT registration number for customers in EU countries/regions.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the customer in connection with electronic document sending.

trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Control GLN - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies which customer address is inserted on sales quotes that you create for the customer.

trans-unit.target: Specifies the customer's trade type to link transactions made for this customer with the appropriate general ledger account according to the general posting setup.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the default currency for the customer.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the default currency for the customer.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the customer price group code, which you can use to set up special sales prices in the Sales Prices window.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the customer price group code, which you can use to set up special sales prices in the Sales Prices window.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Control Customer Price Group - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the customer discount group code, which you can use as a criterion to set up special discounts in the Sales Line Discounts window.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the customer discount group code, which you can use as a criterion to set up special discounts in the Sales Line Discounts window.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Control Customer Disc. Group - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies if a sales line discount is calculated when a special sales price is offered according to setup in the Sales Prices window.
trans-unit.target: Specifies if a sales line discount is calculated when a special sales price is offered according to setup in the Sales Prices window.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Control Allow Line Disc. - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies a code for the invoice discount terms that you have defined for the customer.

trans-unit.source: Specifies if the Unit Price and Line Amount fields on document lines should be shown with or without VAT.

trans-unit.target: Payments
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Control Payments - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies a prepayment percentage that applies to all orders for this customer, regardless of the items or services on the order lines.
trans-unit.target: Specifies a prepayment percentage that applies to all orders for this customer, regardless of the items or services on the order lines.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Control Prepayment % - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies how to apply payments to entries for this customer.
trans-unit.target: Specifies how to apply payments to entries for this customer.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Control Application Method - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies for direct debit collections if the customer that the payment is collected from is a person or a company.
trans-unit.target: Specifies for direct debit collections if the customer that the payment is collected from is a person or a company.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Control Partner Type - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies a code that indicates the payment terms that you require of the customer.
trans-unit.target: Specifies a code that indicates the payment terms that you require of the customer.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Control Payment Terms Code - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the customer usually submits payment, such as bank transfer or check.
trans-unit.target: Specifies how the customer usually submits payment, such as bank transfer or check.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Control Payment Method Code - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies how reminders about late payments are handled for this customer.

trans-unit.source: Specifies finance charges are calculated for the customer.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a payment term that will be used to calculate cash flow for the customer.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to include this customer when you print the Statement report.

trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action "&Customer" - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Dimensions
trans-unit.target: Dimensions
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action Dimensions - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: View or edit dimensions, such as area, project, or department, that you can assign to sales and purchase documents to distribute costs and analyze transaction history.
trans-unit.target: View or edit dimensions, such as area, project, or department, that you can assign to sales and purchase documents to distribute costs and analyze transaction history.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action Dimensions - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Bank Accounts
trans-unit.target: Bank Accounts
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action "Bank Accounts" - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: View or set up the customer's bank accounts. You can set up any number of bank accounts for each customer.
trans-unit.target: View or set up the customer's bank accounts. You can set up any number of bank accounts for each customer.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action "Bank Accounts" - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Direct Debit Mandates
trans-unit.target: Direct Debit Mandates
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action "Direct Debit Mandates" - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: View the direct-debit mandates that reflect agreements with customers to collect invoice payments from their bank account.
trans-unit.target: View the direct-debit mandates that reflect agreements with customers to collect invoice payments from their bank account.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action "Direct Debit Mandates" - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Ship-&to Addresses
trans-unit.target: Ship-&to Addresses
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action ShipToAddresses - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: View or edit alternate shipping addresses where the customer wants items delivered if different from the regular address.
trans-unit.target: View or edit alternate shipping addresses where the customer wants items delivered if different from the regular address.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action ShipToAddresses - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: C&ontact
trans-unit.target: C&ontact
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action Contact - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: View or edit detailed information about the contact person at the customer.
trans-unit.target: View or edit detailed information about the contact person at the customer.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action Contact - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Cross Re&ferences
trans-unit.target: Cross Re&ferences
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action "Cross Re&ferences" - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Set up the customer's own identification of items that you sell to the customer. Cross-references to the customer's item number means that the item number is automatically shown on sales documents instead of the number that you use.
trans-unit.target: Set up the customer's own identification of items that you sell to the customer. Cross-references to the customer's item number means that the item number is automatically shown on sales documents instead of the number that you use.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action "Cross Re&ferences" - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Co&mments
trans-unit.target: Co&mments
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action "Co&mments" - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: View or add comments for the record.
trans-unit.target: View or add comments for the record.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action "Co&mments" - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Approvals
trans-unit.target: Approvals
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action ApprovalEntries - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: View a list of the records that are waiting to be approved. For example, you can see who requested the record to be approved, when it was sent, and when it is due to be approved.
trans-unit.target: View a list of the records that are waiting to be approved. For example, you can see who requested the record to be approved, when it was sent, and when it is due to be approved.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action ApprovalEntries - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Attachments
trans-unit.target: Attachments
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action Attachments - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Add a file as an attachment. You can attach images as well as documents.
trans-unit.target: Add a file as an attachment. You can attach images as well as documents.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action Attachments - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Document Layouts
trans-unit.target: Document Layouts
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action CustomerReportSelections - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Set up a layout for different types of documents such as invoices, quotes, and credit memos.
trans-unit.target: Set up a layout for different types of documents such as invoices, quotes, and credit memos.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action CustomerReportSelections - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.target: Dynamics 365 for Sales

trans-unit.target: Account
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action CRMGotoAccount - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Synchronize
trans-unit.target: Synchronize
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action CRMSynchronizeNow - Property Caption

trans-unit.target: Send or get updated data to or from Dynamics 365 for Sales.

trans-unit.source: Update Account Statistics
trans-unit.target: Update Account Statistics
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action UpdateStatisticsInCRM - Property Caption

trans-unit.target: Send customer statistics data to Dynamics 365 for Sales to update the Account Statistics FactBox.

trans-unit.target: Coupling
trans-unit.note: , Comment='Coupling is a noun'
Page Customer Card - Action Coupling - Property Caption

trans-unit.target: Set Up Coupling

trans-unit.source: S&ales
trans-unit.target: S&ales
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action "S&ales" - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: View a summary of customer ledger entries. You select the time interval in the View by field. The Period column on the left contains a series of dates that are determined by the time interval you have selected.

trans-unit.source: Invoice &Discounts
trans-unit.target: Invoice &Discounts
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action "Invoice &Discounts" - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Set up different discounts that are applied to invoices for the customer. An invoice discount is automatically granted to the customer when the total on a sales invoice exceeds a certain amount.
trans-unit.target: Set up different discounts that are applied to invoices for the customer. An invoice discount is automatically granted to the customer when the total on a sales invoice exceeds a certain amount.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action "Invoice &Discounts" - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Prices
trans-unit.target: Prices
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action Prices - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: View or set up different prices for items that you sell to the customer. An item price is automatically granted on invoice lines when the specified criteria are met, such as customer, quantity, or ending date.
trans-unit.target: View or set up different prices for items that you sell to the customer. An item price is automatically granted on invoice lines when the specified criteria are met, such as customer, quantity, or ending date.

trans-unit.source: Merge two customer records into one. Before merging, review which field values you want to keep or override. The merge action cannot be undone.
trans-unit.target: Merge two customer records into one. Before merging, review which field values you want to keep or override. The merge action cannot be undone.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action MergeDuplicate - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Post Cash Receipts
trans-unit.target: Post Cash Receipts
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action "Post Cash Receipts" - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Create a cash receipt journal line for the customer, for example, to post a payment receipt.
trans-unit.target: Create a cash receipt journal line for the customer, for example, to post a payment receipt.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action "Post Cash Receipts" - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Sales Journal
trans-unit.target: Sales Journal
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action "Sales Journal" - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Post any sales transaction for the customer.
trans-unit.target: Post any sales transaction for the customer.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action "Sales Journal" - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Register Customer Payments
trans-unit.target: Register Customer Payments
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action PaymentRegistration - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Process your customer payments by matching amounts received on your bank account with the related unpaid sales invoices, and then post the payments.
trans-unit.target: Process your customer payments by matching amounts received on your bank account with the related unpaid sales invoices, and then post the payments.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action PaymentRegistration - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Customer Detailed Aging
trans-unit.target: Customer Detailed Aging
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action Report Customer Detailed Aging - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: View a detailed list of each customer's total payments due, divided into three time periods. The report can be used to decide when to issue reminders, to evaluate a customer's creditworthiness, or to prepare liquidity analyses.
trans-unit.target: View a detailed list of each customer's total payments due, divided into three time periods. The report can be used to decide when to issue reminders, to evaluate a customer's creditworthiness, or to prepare liquidity analyses.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action Report Customer Detailed Aging - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Customer - Labels
trans-unit.target: Customer - Labels
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action Report Customer - Labels - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: View mailing labels with the customers' names and addresses.
trans-unit.target: View mailing labels with the customers' names and addresses.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action Report Customer - Labels - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Customer - Balance to Date
trans-unit.target: Customer - Balance to Date
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action Report Customer - Balance to Date - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: View a list with customers' payment history up until a certain date. You can use the report to extract your total sales income at the close of an accounting period or fiscal year.
trans-unit.target: View a list with customers' payment history up until a certain date. You can use the report to extract your total sales income at the close of an accounting period or fiscal year.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action Report Customer - Balance to Date - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Statement
trans-unit.target: Statement
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action Report Statement - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: View a list of a customer's transactions for a selected period, for example, to send to the customer at the close of an accounting period. You can choose to have all overdue balances displayed regardless of the period specified, or you can choose to include an aging band.
trans-unit.target: View a list of a customer's transactions for a selected period, for example, to send to the customer at the close of an accounting period. You can choose to have all overdue balances displayed regardless of the period specified, or you can choose to include an aging band.
trans-unit.note: Page Customer Card - Action Report Statement - Property ToolTip
